channel.title: Canned cans it got canned
channel.description:
**This is a turbo based off a own made faction** Days: 15 Minutes. Nights: 5 Minutes. Christis have night chat only.
Setup (Forgot this forgive me masters)
Voting - First person to get half of everyones vote aka 9/8 players, 5 votes. 7/6, 4 Votes. there is no trials. Only investigatives will get feedback or noble Gossip. Logs are allowed. Whispering isn't allowed. No D1 lynch. (D1 is 5 minutes long)
[color=#FFBF00] The Christis Faction [/color] This faction is based off points, all members will start with 4 points, it's up to the Pacifist to handle the points and conversion.
Class Cards: [color=#0080FF]Blue Dragon[/color]. (*Your objective is to defeat the [color=#FFBF00]Christs[/color], and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*) [details="Summary"] >[color=#0080FF]**The Butler**[/color]. **Blue Dragon Offensive** **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Nightshade Wine (Day)** - Poison The King, causing him to die tonight if not healed. The king will not be informed if he is poisoned. If the King is Good, you will commit suicide. - 1 use, available starting Day 3 **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. - Infinite uses **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight (Bypasses occupy immunity). - 2 uses Converts to the Slave.
>**[color=#0080FF]The Chronomancer[/color]** **Blue Dragon Support** **Pocket Dimension (Day)** - If you die tonight, delay it for 2 nights. This will delay bleeding in addition to attacks. Deaths delayed this way cannot be redirected with Distort Reality. - 2 uses **Time Warp (Night)** - Delays a player’s death for 2 days. This will delay bleeding in addition to attacks. You can prevent a death multiple times. Cannot delay unhealable attacks or suicide. - Infinite uses **Distort Reality (Night)** - Redirect all deaths that you have delayed with Time Warp to the target player. Can be healed and does not bypass death immunity. - Infinite uses Converts into Timetravler
>**[color=#0080FF]The Court Wizard[/color]** **Blue Dragon Support** **Magical Barrier (Night)** - Protect a player from negative effects and conversion tonight. Does not prevent attacks. - Infinite uses **Tornado (Night)** - Swap two players this will redirect there visitors. - 2 uses Converts Into magician
>[color=#0080FF]**The Drunk**[/color] **Blue Dragon Offensive** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Debauchery (Night)** - Force a player to target a second of your choice. (you won’t be immune to attacks or conversion if you force them to target you) - Infinite use **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy a player, and disable any death or occupy immunity they have for the night. - 2 uses Converts into Maudlin
>[color=#0080FF]**The Exorcist**[/color] **Blue Dragon Investigative** **Scrutinise (Night)** - Learn if a player is Christis. - Infinite use **Exorcism (Night )** - Kill a player if they are Christis - 2 Use [Can't be used until n3]
>[color=#0080FF]**The Hunter**[/color] (Unique) **Blue Dragon Killer** **Retribution (Passive)** - If found guilty of treason, your first accuser will be killed. **Wolf Companion (Day)** - Make Someone Bleed during the day - 2 uses. **Hunters Mark (Night)** - Mark someone to another player, if that player visits them you'll kill them. - 3 uses **Bear Companion (Night)** - Summon a bear to protect you, granting you death and conversion immunity for the night. You will kill any attackers (Bypasses night immunity). - 3 uses Converts into Trapper.
>**[color=#0080FF]The Knight[/color]** **Blue Dragon Killer** **Armored (Passive)** - Your first successful use of Defend will not kill you. **Defend (Night)** - You will guard the target player tonight, giving your life to kill their attacker(s). - Infinite uses **Cold Steel (Night)** - Choose a player to attack. If they are a member of the Blue Dragon, you will also take your own life. - Infinite uses [Not usable until N3] Converts into Commander.
>[color=#0080FF]**The Maid**[/color] **Blue Dragon Investigative** **Matchmake (Night)** - Test if target is compatible with the player you last checked. - Infinite Uses **Quickmatch (Night)** - Re-select two new players, Won't count as visiting - 1 Use. Converts into mistress.
>**[color=#0080FF]The Princess[/color]** **Blue Dragon Investigative** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Flirt (Night)** - Learn two class types that a player can be. [Killer/Offensive, Social/Support, Special/Invest] **Will-o-Wisp (Night)** - Learn if that target attacked tonight - 3 Uses.
>**[color=#0080FF]The Observer[/color]** **Blue Dragon Investigative** **Sharp look (Day)** - Combine both your night abilities to see who visits and who they visit tonight - 2 Uses. Follow (Night) - Track, someone seeing who they visit - Infinite. Watch (Night) - Watch who visits someone - Infinite.
>[color=#0080FF]**The Noble**[/color] **Blue Dragon Social** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Friendship(Passive)** - You'll be able to talk to [X] and [X] at night all both know each other but won't know each others classes, the chat is disabled when two of you die. **Noble Twin (Day)** - Your vote count will be double, but won't be announced - 3 Uses. **Gossip (Night)** - Listen to feedback on a player - Infinite Uses. Converts into Patrician.
>**[color=#0080FF]The Physician[/color]** **Blue Dragon Support** **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - You are immune to bleeding. **Self Care (Passive)** - You can heal yourself twice. **Innoculate (Day)** - Prevent a player from being poisoned or bled for the rest of the game. - 1 use **Exhume (Day) -** At the end of the night, learn what classes killed a player, or if they committed suicide. - 2 uses **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and curing any bleeding they were suffering from. - Infinite uses -Converts into the practitioner
>**[color=#0080FF]The Prince[/color]** (Unique) **Blue Dragon Killer** **Unstoppable (Passive)** - You cannot be occupied at night, even by means that bypass occupy immunity. You are also immune to target changing. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. - Infinite uses **Execute (Night)** - Kill the player you have jailed (Bypasses night immunity). If the executed is a member of the Blue Dragon, you will not be able to execute for the rest of the game. - 2 uses. [Cannot use until N3] *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* -Cannot be converted.
>**[color=#0080FF]The Squire[/color]** **Blue Dragon Support** **Sharp Wits (Passive)** - The first time you are attacked, you will survive it. **Train (Night)** - Become the non-unique class of a target deceased Blue Dragon player. - Infinite uses -Converts into the Trainer [/details]
[color=#BFBFBF]Neutrals[/color]. (Different objectives)
[details="Summary"]
>**[color=#BFBFBF]The Alchemist[/color]** **Neutral Support** >**Coagulate (Passive)** - Immune to bleeding >**Stone Skin Potion (Day)** - Make yourself Immune tonight - 3 Uses. >**Emerald Potion (Day)** - Kill someone with your heal bypassing healing, can be cancelled 1 - Use. **Crimson Potion (Night)** - Heal someone from attacks and curing there bleeding - Infinite **Tar Potion (Day)** - Occupy a player tonight - Infinite *Survive until the end of the game*
>**[color=#BFBFBF]The Guardian[/color]** **Neutral Support** >**In my sted (Passive)** - You'll die in place of your target [x], unless they where day executed or killed by Prince >**Protector (Passive)** - Immune to Occupation and redirection, will commit suicide if target dies or cannot win, You and your target will know each others classes. >**Stalk (Day)** - Occupy a them if they target your target [X] >**Purge (Night)** - Heal your target and make the appear as BD, ignoring frames. - 3 Uses. >**Revenge Night** - Kill a someone for accusing your target for Treason - 1 Use. *Make sure your target wins*
>[color=#BFBFBF]**The Mercenary**[/color] **Neutral Support** >**Protection services (Passive)** - Immune to occupation, for each visit your prevent you'll get a bridler, You'll start with 2 Bridlers. >**Don Amour (Day)** - Make yourself Immune tonight - 2 Uses. **Stand Guard** - Prevent visitors, you'll gain a bridler for each visit - Infinite. **Shield** - Place a Shield that will stay on someone until they are attacked it will save them, cannot be used after the first successful save, you'll gain 3 bridlers from it - Infinite. *You must collect 6 Brilders*
>[color=#BFBFBF]**The Fool**[/color] **Neutral Social** **Poor fellow (Passive)** - If executed, no one may vote the next day, also every execute will lose one use from all limited abilities, Christis members will lose 1 point, Mercenary will lose a bridler. **Trickery (Night)** - Make yourself appear evil to investigatives tonight - 2 uses. **Hide (Night)** - You'll make yourself Immune to attacks - 3 uses. *Make sure you get executed during the day*
>[color=#BFBFBF]**The Scorned**[/color] **Neutral Social** **Target (Passive)** - your target is [X] and [X], they will always start as blue Dragon. If both die you'll commit suicide. **In raged (Passive)** - Immune to death at night. **Night (Ability)** - Incriminate, Frame one of your targets making them appear evil to investigative's - 3 Uses. *See one of your targets formally executed*
>[color=#BFBFBF]**The Sellsword**[/color] **Neutral Offensive** **Among Friends (Passive)** - Will show up as evil to Investigatives, is Immune to attacks from non-Blue Dragon. **Last effort (Passive)** - If all evils die, You're stonewall Ability will also Kill. **Spite (Day)** - If someone uses a day ability targeted at someone they will self target, only effects Blue Dragon, Not Prince. - 2 Uses. **Intimidate (Night)** - Occupy someone preventing them from taking actions - Infinite. **Stone wall (Day)** - Prevent non Neutral Killer, Christis actions on that player, you'll learn how many attempted to target them, You'll also learn if evils successfully targeted them. -Infinite. *Blue Dragon must lose.*
>[color=#BFBFBF]**The Spanish Inquisitor**[/color] **Neutral Investigative** **Spanish Inquisitor (Passive)** - You've been given Spanish lessons and it freaks out attackers making you Immune, but they will take away your Spanish lessons and you'll forget how to speak Spanish being killed if attacked again. **Not Spanish (Passive)** - You'll learn the three targets that are not Spanish, cannot be starting Crusader, Prince, Hunter or any neutrals. **Spanish quiz (Night Ability)** , Learn if the player speaks Spanish, you'll learn there class if they don't and know they aren't a Spanish speaker - Infinite **Ruthless Spanish, SPANISH you'll kill them by playing Spanish music - 3 Uses.** *Must survive to see all the non Spanish people die*
>**[color=#BFBFBF]The Sorcerer[/color]** **Neutral Killer** **Magical Armour** - Immune to death and bleeding. **Perspective** - You won't attack if the target is immune or being protected. **Plant Bomb (Day)** - Plant a bomb inside someone or swap a bomb into someone else, Cannot be plated on King - Infinite **Threaten (Day)** - Make someone unable to vote, usable on king - 3 Uses. **Magical Missile (Night)** - Fire a magic missal killing someone - Infinite. **Detonate** (Night)** - Kill all players with bombs in them - Infinite. *Kill everyone that is Blue Dragon and Christis* [/details] [color=#FFBF00]Christis [/color] (*Must see [color=#0080FF]Blue Dragon[/color] and the [color=#BFBFBF]Neutral killer [/color] defeted*)
[details="Summary"] >[color=#FFBF00]**The Pacifist**[/color] **Christis Special** **Sacrifice (Passive)** - If you die all Christis will gain 2 Points. **Empowerment (Day)** - Make a fellow member Immune and appear as [color=#0080FF]Blue Dragon [/color]tonight - 2 Points **Last efforts (Day**) - Become a Crusader if you cannot convert anyon - 1 Use. **Invite (Night)** - Convert someone to become a [color=#FFBF00]Christis [/color] - Infinite [1 Day cool down] **Buff (Night)** - Let somone gain 4 Points - Infinite.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Crusader**[/color] **Christis Killer** **Fall, my tears** (Passive) - If your alone Pacifist turn Crusader you won't have limited Kills **Rot (Day)** - Make somone bleed out and die in two days - 1 Point [Max 4 uses] **Brand (Day)** - Make someone appear evil tonight - 2 Points. **Murder (Night)** - Kill someone tonight - 1 Point. **Brutal Attack (Night)** - Kill someone, making them bleed and die the next day, if protected or Immune - 2 Points.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Slave**[/color]. (Butler Convert) **Christis Offensive** **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. - 1 Point **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight (Bypasses occupy immunity). - 2 Points
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Maudlin**[/color]. (Drunk Convert) **Christis Offensive** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Debauchery (Night)** - Force a player to target a second of your choice. (you won’t be immune to attacks or conversion if you force them to target you) - 1 Point. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy a player, and disable any death or occupy immunity they have for the night. - 2 Points.
>**[color=#FFBF00]The Time Traveller[/color]** (Chronmancer Convert) **Christis Support** **Pocket Dimension (Day)** - If you die tonight, delay it for 2 nights. This will delay bleeding in addition to attacks. - 2 Points. **Time Snatch (Night)** - If they are bleeding you'll kill them tonight - 2 Points. **Construct Reality (Night)** - players trying to target who you select will self target - 1 Point.
>**[color=#FFBF00]The Magician[/color]** (Court Wizard Convert) **Christis Support** **Pants on fire (Day)** - If someone uses a day ability targeted at someone they will self target, Doesn't effect Neutral killers and Prince - 1 Point **Tornado (Night)** - Swap two players around swapping there visits and visitors - 1 Point. **Nightmare Spell (Night)** - Give someone false feedback of your choice if investigative - 2 Points [details="Feedback."] *Make target look Blue Dragon* *Make target look Neutral* *Make target look Christis* *Make target believe they where occupied* *Make target believe they where redirected to [x]* [/details]
>**[color=#FFBF00]The Commander[/color]** (Knight Convert) **Christis Killer** **Second plan (Night)** - If the Crusaders Kill fails you will kill that target - 1 Point. **Protection (Night)** - Prevent visitors on who you target tonight - 2 Points.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Trapper**[/color] (Hunter Convert) **Christis Offensive** **Trappers Mark (Day)** - target two players if the first targets the second at night you'll occupy them. - 0.5 points. **Nettle Trap** - Place a trap on someone Occupying visitors, Trap stays on until activated. - 2 Points. **Spite Trap** - Occupy a player and there visitors - 2 Points.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Trainer**[/color] (Squire Convert) **Christis Support** >**Train** - Become the converted class of a dead Blue Dragon player, or a dead Christis - Infinite.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Practitioner**[/color] (Physician Convert) >**Christis Support** Exhume (Day) - Learn what killed a player - 1 Point. Night Ability(1) - Innocent Heal, Protect a player and cure there bleeding, making them appear BD. - 1 Point. Night Ability(2) - Weak Spot, You'll make sure the Crusader kills tonight, unless jailed or night Immune - 2 Points.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Dexorcist**[/color] (Exorcist Convert) **Christis Social** **Snoop (Day)** - Take someone's log books - 1 Point. **Uncover (Day)** - Uncover, Learn who the prince is Jailing tonight - 1 Point **Forge (Night)** - Leave fake log books out if your target dies. - 1 Point. **Rumour (Day)** - Make someone appear as a class of your choosing to investigatives - 1 Point
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Patrician**[/color] (Noble Convert) **Christis Social** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Friendship (Passive)** - You’ll be able to talk to [X] and [X] at night all both know each other but won’t know each others classes, the chat is disabled when two of you die. **Noble Twin (Day)** - Your vote count will be double, but won’t be announced - 1 Point. **Intrigue (Night)** - Listen to feedback on a player, also framing them - 1 Point.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Widow**[/color] (Princess Convert) **Christis Investigative** Bat eyelashes (Night) - Learn the class type of a player and there faction - 1 Point. Seduce (Night) - Learn the full class of someone - 3 Points.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Mistress**[/color] (Maid Convert) **Christis Investigative** **Compare** (Night) - Match two players if they share the same class type you'll learn what classes they are, if they don't you'll learn two class types they could be. - 1 Point. **Finding Match** - Learn the class types of two players - 2 Points.
>[color=#FFBF00]**The Stalker**[/color] (Observer Convert) **Christis Investigative** **I see you! (Passive)** - you'll know who visits the Christis at night. **Following Bird (Day)** - Place a birde that will permanently follow someone - 1 Point. **Tracking Bird (Day)** - Place a Birde that will permanently Watch someone - 1 Point. **Watch Carefully (Passive)** - Follow someone seeing who visits them and who they visit - 1 Point.
[/details]
Kings [details="Summary"] >**[color=#0080FF]Good King[/color]** **Blue Dragon Special** **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. If you are lynched, all members of the Blue Dragon will lose their Royal Blood passive. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as Two. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason. They may provide a defense, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guards! (Night)** - Choose a player or yourself They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Swear Fealty (Night)** - Make a player permanently immune to conversion. - 1 use (Starting King Only.)
>**[color=#FFBF00]Evil King[/color]** **Christis Special** **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as Two. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason. They may provide a defense, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guards! (Night)** - Choose a player or yourself They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Allies (Night)** - Learn if a player is Christis or not. - 3 uses. (Starting King Only)
>**[color=#BFBFBF]Neutral King[/color]** **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. If you are lynched. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as Two. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason. They may provide a defense, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guards! (Night)** - Choose a player or yourself They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Lookout** (Night)** - You'll be Immune to attacks from your target tonight. - 5 Uses. *Survive until the end of game, Crowned From, Alchemist, Pretender, Mercenary, Guardian, Inquisitor*
>**[color=#BFBFBF]Traitor King[/color]** **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as Two. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason. They may provide a defense, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guards! (Night)** - Choose a player or yourself They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses *Make sure Blue Dragon lose, Crowned from Sellsword, Scorned and fool.*
>**[color=#BFBFBF]Psycho King[/color]** **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as Two. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason. They may provide a defense, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Order Execution** - Kill a player will not count as visiting - Infinite. **Brutal Betrayal** - Kill a target bypassing everything - 1 Use. [/details]
Class list: **[color=#FF0000]Not fully determined[/color]**. (It will be pretty starndard just need to know how many are playing). [color=#0080FF]Prince[/color] King - 60% - Good, 25% Evil, 15%, Neutral. [color=#0080FF]Exorcist[/color] [color=#FFBF00]Crusader[/color] [color=#FFBF00]Pacifist[/color]
At least 9 players required.
Player list *1.* Priestess. *2.* CuteAlch. *3.* Isaac *4.* Wazza *5.* Gamerpoke *6.* Kape *7.* Firekitten *8.* Apostle *9.* Geyde *10.* Darknesu *11.* Maxwell :crown:
Starts a hour after I get 9 people.
Role List King (Good60%/Evil25%/Neutral/15%) Prince Exorcist Blue Dragon 5 Neutral 1 Crusader Pacifist

item.title: Canned cans it got canned
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Apostle:

you guys are fucking crazy and im so confused, wazza is just calling soul out for random reasons, im so confused

We don’t traditionally stick to mechanics to figure out who scum are here.
What we do say may sound crazy but it’s an integral part of mafia; finding scum.

About how we acted post game, we also have the problem where we fight. A lot.

Read full topic
